daily_take.headline: Maine Democrats Are Ready to Make Platner Their Senate Bet
daily_take.deck: Graham Platner's odds just jumped 12.5 points to 80% in 24 hours, signaling serious momentum toward a Democratic nomination he hasn't officially secured yet. The $1.1M in volume suggests real money believes he's clearing the field. Maine's Senate race is shaping up fast, and the market is pricing in a done deal before the ink dries on anything official.
